Lde/ecspride/ApplicationLifecyle2;->onCr: The method initializes the IMEI field with the device ID obtained from the TelephonyManager. This involves calling getDeviceId() on the TelephonyManager and storing the result in the ApplicationLifecycle2's imei field.
Lde/ecspride/ApplicationLifecyle2;->onLo: This method sends a text message using the default SmsManager, likely with a hardcoded phone number (+49 1234).
